speaker.whotheyare: Fashion executive turned TV host Bevy Smith is here to tell it as she sees it. Get ready for some "Bevelations."
speaker.whylisten:
Bevy Smith is the host of the Sirius XM radio show Bevelations and cohost of the nationally syndicated TV show Page Six TV. The former luxury fashion publishing executive emerged as a pop culture aficionado and fashion expert when she moderated the Bravo TV show Fashion Queens. Her 2021 memoir, Bevelations: Lessons from a Mutha, Auntie, Bestie, details the twists and turns of her career, documenting her path from corporate boardroom to on-air presence.

A lifelong Harlem resident, Smith regularly hosts Fashion for Action, an annual fundraiser for Housing Works, New York City's beloved thrift store chain and advocacy group. In 2017, she was named a "Community Champion of AIDS Organization" by Harlem United. She is a Gracie Award winner for National Radio.
